nodes.text: Hollastin was a world located in the Hutt Space region of the galaxy. It was connected to fellow Hutt Space world Circumtore as well as the world Syvris by hyperspace routes. Hollastin was located at galactic coordinates S-12.

Hollastin was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a roleplaying game released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. The world originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
